Re 5/
Scalara: We have a new leader in the Scalara NFT Index $NFTI:
👑@doodles overtake @cryptopunksnfts, in terms of index weight, as their floor price reaches new all time highs. 🌈 
Note: At the last rebalance, exposure to CryptoPunks was capped to avoid concentration risk. /1

Dan Robinson: Uniswap is arguably becoming the primary market for ETH
New research from @gordonliao and me shows that Uniswap v3 has deeper liquidity in ETH/USD and ETH/BTC than leading exchanges like Coinbase and Binance
 https://www.paradigm.xyz/2022/05/the-dominance-of-uniswap-v3-liquidity

DeFi Pulse 🍇: Some thoughts from @justinavery on the strengths of fractional NFTs:
"CryptoPunks cost a fortune and it's difficult to buy them outright, but if you have faith in the collection you can buy little bit by little bit and build up to 1 token over time."
